# mc-button

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->

| Property      | Attribute       | Description                                                                                             | Type                                                                                | Default     |
| ------------- | --------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `btnType`     | `btn-type`      |                                                                                                         | `"action" \| "alt" \| "error" \| "ghost" \| "normal" \| "transparent" \| "warning"` | `'normal'`  |
| `disabled`    | `disabled`      |                                                                                                         | `boolean`                                                                           | `false`     |
| `dropdown`    | `dropdown`      | Show dropdown icon on right (shorthand for `icon-right="mds-caret-down-fill"`)                          | `boolean`                                                                           | `false`     |
| `elAriaLabel` | `el-aria-label` | The aria-label attribute for the inner button element.                                                  | `string`                                                                            | `undefined` |
| `form`        | `form`          |                                                                                                         | `string`                                                                            | `undefined` |
| `formaction`  | `formaction`    |                                                                                                         | `string`                                                                            | `undefined` |
| `full`        | `full`          | Sets display to flex instead of inline-flex                                                             | `boolean`                                                                           | `false`     |
| `href`        | `href`          | Create button as link                                                                                   | `string`                                                                            | `undefined` |
| `hug`         | `hug`           | Sets the min-width to 0. When combined with a single icon/slot, the text is not centered in the button. | `boolean`                                                                           | `false`     |
| `iconLeft`    | `icon-left`     | Class name of left icon                                                                                 | `string`                                                                            | `undefined` |
| `iconRight`   | `icon-right`    | Class name of right icon                                                                                | `string`                                                                            | `undefined` |
| `small`       | `small`         |                                                                                                         | `boolean`                                                                           | `false`     |
| `target`      | `target`        | Only for link buttons                                                                                   | `string`                                                                            | `undefined` |
| `type`        | `type`          |                                                                                                         | `"button" \| "reset" \| "submit"`                                                   | `'button'`  |
| `value`       | `value`         |                                                                                                         | `string`                                                                            | `undefined` |
